alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 28 at 10:54PM PDT until May 29 at 2:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Downslope west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...Until 2 AM PDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Winds will make driving difficult for large trucks... motorcycles...trailers and campers. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Lofted dust could reduce visibilities on roadways.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
